content: Where do categories in http://fhir.org/guides/registry/ come from? I don't see "EHR Access" (re: Bulk Data) listed in https://github.com/HL7/bulk-data or in http://hl7.org/fhir/uv/bulkdata/package.tgz .
(This is one very small piece pf a very large "ballot publication checklist" puzzle that I'm not smart enough to solve.)
they are unique to the registry and are decided upon at the time of first publication with @Grahame Grieve as the final arbiter.
OK, but they're sometimes documented in a package-list file within an IG? Or is that a new development and they weren't previously?
they are in the package-list.json that is used for final publishing for STU or ballot when a new entry goes into the registry
But is this a new development? Like, the package-list.json in http://hl7.org/fhir/uv/bulkdata/package.tgz doesn't have this.
It's new-ish. It wasn't part of the package-list.json originally
the requirement that any new ig have a category is new
